overall_summary: The core development team has pivoted focus to ElizaCloud improvements, de-prioritizing v2.0.0 work. Significant technical progress was made in multi-step workflows while the project addressed critical OAuth infrastructure planning and GitHub Action authentication failures.
key_facts: Pr Number 6351 for elizaos v2.0.0 was opened by lalalune on January 9, 2026.
Borko directed the team to deprioritize v2.0.0 work and concentrate exclusively on cloud improvements.
The claude-review.yml workflow file failed with 401 Unauthorized errors during OIDC token exchange.
A beta leaderboard feature was launched providing lifetime summarization for contributor profiles reachable via API.
The 1.7.0 release encountered compatibility reports when used with plugin-discord 1.3.3.
Recursive Language Models (RLMs) research was shared, proposing prompt processing beyond model context windows.
A proposal for an OAuth relay at twitter-broker.elizaos.ai was initiated for plugin-twitter.
The ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for CI/CD was renewed after identifying expiration issues in GitHub Actions.
open_questions: How do I get a response after opening a Ticket in official ElizaOs support? In the opened ticket or through the DM?
What price level is the foundation targeting for 2026?
Can the OIDC transfer from cloud?
How can I contact the team for partnership talks?
What model you use for the generation?

twitter_news_highlights.claim: Community hosted a Twitter Space titled 'WTF is 8004?' despite audio dropouts and disconnection issues.
ElizaBAO verified its status as a Polymarket affiliate by sharing proof of real user registrations and deposits.

new_issues_prs.title: feat(v2.0.0): wasm agent runtime
new_issues_prs.author: revlentless
new_issues_prs.significance: Enables Rust core to run in browser/Node.js environments via WebAssembly.

new_issues_prs.title: V2.0.0
new_issues_prs.author: lalalune
new_issues_prs.significance: Massive structural overhaul shifting runtime focus to Rust and Typescript.

new_issues_prs.title: Messaging API - Fix double processing & align transports
new_issues_prs.author: linear
new_issues_prs.significance: Addresses architectural duplication and double-processing bugs in the messaging bus.

overall_focus.claim: Consolidated effort to strengthen platform stability through SQL plugin fixes, unified API chat hooks, and documentation expansion toward 95% coverage.

discord_updates.summary: Focus has shifted to ElizaCloud improvements including credit top-up idempotency fixes and test architecture review. Authentication issues with GitHub OIDC persist.
Discussions on Recursive Language Models (RLMs) for extended context and detailed instructions for monorepo knowledge uploads involving cli linking.

user_feedback.feedback_summary: Users reported persistent 401 Unauthorized errors with CI code review workflows, even after key replacement.
Community members suggested news show names to replace 'AI News', including 'Breaking Bits' and 'Context Crunch'.

strategic_insights.insight: The decision to halt v2.0.0 development in favor of Cloud improvements indicates a strategic shift toward monetization and near-term infrastructure stability over architectural overhauls.
implications_or_questions: Will this delay the community's adoption of the Rust runtime?
Does this align with user demand for a production-ready cloud environment?

market_analysis.observation: Community discussion regarding ElizaOS token utility as 'gas' for the Jeju network compared to Ethereum's ERC-20 organic demand model.
market_analysis.relevance: Directly impacts tokenomics design and long-term investor sentiment if adoption goals are unmet.
